channel.title: Japan on Solidforest
channel.description: Recent content in Japan on Solidforest

item.title: Welcome Kodama
item.description: Kodama, you already know, that’s an iconic character from a Japanese legend. Although described as a small figure and dim in appearance, but his role is very big and noble. Protecting trees, protecting forests which also means protecting the world, I am serieous. It turns out that Japan is not only famous for its sushi, yes ðŸ˜„ but also mythology that has local wisdom and good attitude for the environment.
